title: Retro Fitz Pop-Up: Yaba Street Jam
short: Exclusive drops, DJ sets, and retro fits IRL.
description: Pull up for a high-energy street pop-up in Yaba. We’re dropping limited tees and throwback cuts, with live DJ sets and a quick styling corner. Expect sticker packs for early birds, photo spots for the gram, and a peek at the next capsule. Come comfortable—there’ll be on-the-spot swaps and friendly contests.

title: Eko Night Runway x Retro Fitz
location: Eko Convention Centre, Victoria Island, Lagos
description: A nighttime runway experience celebrating Lagos creativity. We’re mixing neon palettes with retro silhouettes, styled with modern street flair. Expect a tight show flow, live visuals, and a pop-up booth after the runway to feel the fabrics and pre-order select pieces. Seating is limited—arrive early.

title: Lookbook Styling Workshop
short: Hands-on styling for lookbooks and reels.
description: A practical, small-group workshop on building a lookbook from scratch. We’ll cover fast styling frameworks, color blocking, picking backgrounds that pop, and how to shoot a 30-second vertical reel that converts. Bring two outfits, your phone, and be ready to test ideas live with our mini set.

title: Community Meet & Greet: Ikeja
description: A relaxed community link-up with photo ops, light swaps (clean pieces only), and a casual Q&A about upcoming drops. We’ll also share early sketches and get feedback from the tribe. Family friendly; great for connecting with other retro lovers and stylists.
